title: Traits and Features
content: two alchemical solutions instead of one when combining extracts, if you succeed a DC 15 Medicine check Transmutation School (Lvl 2 Wizard Subclass) Wild Strike Class Feature You can make an additional attack after making an unarmed strike while in wildshape. Druid Lvl 5 Improved Wild Strike Class Feature You can make 2 additional attacks after making an Unarmed Strike while in Wild Shape. Druid Lvl 10 Primal Strike Subclass Feature While in beast form, your attacks count as magical for the purp
